description.value: You grant greater healing when the gods don't interfere. When you roll a success to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Treat Wounds]{Treat Wounds} for a creature that hasn't regained Hit Points from divine magic in the past 24 hours, you get a critical success on your check instead and restore the corresponding amount of Hit Points.

value.value: You follow the Laws of Mortality
